message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I can't go as low as $100, I'm willing to come down a bit to $130. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $130, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to pay $110 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
